name: Lost X
description:
Lost X is the first game I ever made - right after high school. So there might be some bugs. If you encounter any, please leave a comment. That would help a lot :) 

The game is made with RPG maker MV. All the arts and sounds I used in the game is provided by it. Anything else is made by Allie, me :)

And, it is important to mention that the game is in Chinese. 

If Chinese is not accessible to you, while, I guess you can still take a look and look around, but you might not find it very hard to complete the game.

So, good luck:)
